task.title: Retrieve Manually
task.shortdesc: Retrieve Discarded nodes using the "drag and drop" method with the following steps

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Click and hold the node, illuminating the circular green Shelf.
Without releasing the clicker, drag the node to the Shelf.
Release the clicker to drop the node and execute the action.
